content: are you looking for a great stash busting project want a pattern that is fun and fast to work up then the emilia cowl is perfect for you this cowl is written for ages 2-4 4-10 teen and adult it uses simple stitches to keep the momentum going for you and throws in a half_double_crochet cluster which is not as difficult as it sounds the emilia cowl works up quickly use your stash or part skeins to create each section or go with a solid colour for an equally stunning cowl your project will be perfect for keeping for you or gifting why not make a mummy and me set stitches used in us terms chain half_double_crochet hdcl half_double_crochet cluster camel stitch also k a half_double_crochet into the third loop double_crochet single_crochet there are stitch charts available for parts 1 and 3 to help with stitch placement
